events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item received.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been approved and initiated. Please allow some time for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the refund was received today. Thank you for resolving my issue quickly and efficiently.
We have closed your case following your confirmation of refund receipt. Please contact us anytime for further assistance.
